infos.value: You can acquire items such as Light Blue Magicite, optimal for training Water Espers.
You can acquire items such as Red Magicite, optimal for training Fire Espers.
You can acquire items such as Orange Magicite, optimal for training Earth Espers.
You can acquire items such as Blue Magicite, optimal for training Ice Espers.
You can acquire items such as Yellow Magicite, optimal for training Lightning Espers.
You can acquire items such as Purple Magicite, optimal for training Dark Espers.
You can acquire items such as White Magicite, optimal for training Light Espers.
You can acquire items such as Green Magicite, optimal for training Wind Espers.
You can acquire items such as Adamantite, necessary for enhancing Equipment.
You can acquire Magicite of all elements, necessary for training Espers.
You can acquire FFI Event Medals and items optimal for training Warrior of Light.
